pdVersion.description: version of power delivery spec implemented by controller

usbTypecRevision.description: usb type-c spec revision implemented by controller

usbTcpiRevision.description: usb type-c port controller interface spec revision implemented by controller

fastRoleSwapSupport.description: whether the port controller supports fast role swap (FRS)

vconnPowerSupport.description: whether the port controller has support for vconn power

vconnFetOnResistance.description: on-resistance of the integrated Vconn FET

vconnPowerLimit.description: power limit supported by internal vconn switch (if supported)

vconnMaxCurrent.description: maximum continuous current supported by internal vconn switch (if supported)

vconnOverCurrentLimit.description: over current limit supported by internal vconn switch (if supported)

integratedVbusDischargeSwitch.description: whether the port controller has one or more integrated vbus discharge switches

integratedMux.description: whether the port controller has one or more integrated high speed muxes

interface.description: describes the communication interface from the controller to the policy manager

currentConsumption.description: current used by device in various power modes

componentProtectionThresholds.description: thermal and power supply protection thresholds of a device
